text: Sulthan Bathery State assembly constituency () is one of the 140 state legislative assembly constituencies in Kerala state in southern India. It is also one of the 7 state legislative assembly constituencies included in the Wayanad Lok Sabha constituency. As of the 2016 assembly elections, the current MLA is I. C. Balakrishnan of INC. == Results of Assembly Elections in the constituency == {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" cellpadding="6" style="width:80%; font-size:100%;" ! scope="col" |Year ! scope="col" |Niyama Sabha ! scope="col" |Category ! scope="col" |Winning Candidate ! scope="col" |Winning Party ! scope="col" |Vote ! scope="col" |Runner-up ! scope="col" |Party ! scope="col" |Vote ! scope="col" |Majority |---- | 1977 | 5th | ST |K. Balakrishnan | rowspan="2" |INC | rowspan="2" style="background-color: "| | 2011 – 2016 |- | 2016 |14th | Incumbent |} == Election results == === Niyamasabha Election 2016 === There were 2,18,241 registered voters in the constituency for the 2016 election. === Niyamasabha Election 2011 === There were 1,98,645 registered voters in the constituency for the 2011 election. == See also == * Sulthan Bathery * Wayanad district * List of constituencies of the Kerala Legislative Assembly * 2016 Kerala Legislative Assembly election == References == Category:State assembly constituencies in Wayanad district
